text: Egha Ikiavɨra Itir God kamaghɨn mɨgei, “Kɨ fomɨra Israelian kantri gamizɨ moghɨn, kɨ bar arazir magh garimɨn Judan kantri damigham. Kɨ Jerusalem akɨrim ragh a gasaragham, kar nguibar ekiar kɨ ua bagha mɨsevezim. Egh dɨpenir kɨ mɨsevezɨ gumazamiziba an izɨ nan ziam famin kam, kɨ akɨrim ragh a gasaragham.”
